versions.prompt: Create a responsive card with image, title, and description
versions.code:
import React from 'react';
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { Card, CardSection, Image, Text, Title, Button, Stack, Group } from '@mantine/core';

const meta: Meta<typeof Card> = {
  title: 'Generated/Responsive Card',
  component: Card,
  parameters: { layout: 'centered' },
  tags: ['autodocs'],
};

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj<typeof meta>;

export const Default: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ width: 340 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/340/160?random=1"
          alt="Card image"
          height={160}
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Stack gap="md" style={{ marginTop: 'var(--mantine-spacing-md)' }}>
        <Title order={3}>Explore the Mountains</Title>
        
        <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
          Discover breathtaking views and adventurous trails in the heart of nature. 
          Perfect destination for outdoor enthusiasts seeking unforgettable experiences.
        </Text>

        <Button variant="light" fullWidth>
          Learn More
        </Button>
      </Stack>
    </Card>
  ),
};

          alt="Product image"
          height={160}
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Stack gap="md" style={{ marginTop: 'var(--mantine-spacing-md)' }}>
        <Title order={3}>Premium Wireless Headphones</Title>
        
        <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
          High-quality audio experience with active noise cancellation and 
          30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.
        </Text>

        <Text size="xl" fw={700}>
          $299.99
        </Text>

        <Group grow>
          <Button variant="filled">
            Buy Now
          </Button>

            Add to Cart

      </Stack>
    </Card>
  ),
};
